item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: McBride's Pub in Wayland Square!

The opening of McBride's Pub was a much anticipated event for the Wayland Square P-Collective folks early last summer. It instantly became a natural gathering place for the neighborhood - sitting outside on the patio for a pint or enjoying the cozy warmth of the large bar and bistro tables on a rainy night - its great! Did I mention that its also a funeral home?

So for those that know (and there are A LOT of you), and those that don't - yet. We're heading to McBride's - again! Come over to the East Side and bring your good cheer.  Its a great one to know about - you'll be back!

So let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...Nothing cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Ali is hosting this one! Please look at her picture!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - McBrides in Wayland Square!
